description.value: Regeneration functions even while Manshoon is exposed to direct sunlight as long as he wears Manshoon's bloodmask.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force, Weapon

Standard

+31 vs AC; 1d6+8 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

+33 vs Reflex; 2d6+10 damage.

Healing

Standard

Trigger: When an adjacent creature becomes bloodied

+31 vs Fortitude; 2d12+9 damage, the target is weakened (save ends), and Manshoon regains 125 hit points.

Recharge 6

Ranged 5

+32 vs Will; the target is dominated (save ends, with a -2 penalty to the saving throw). Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends). Manshoon can dominate only one creature at a time.

Encounter ✦ Force

Standard

Area burst 4 within 10

Sustain Minor

+33 vs Reflex; 2d6+10 force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of Manshoon's next turn. Manshoon makes new attack rolls when he sustains this effect.

At-Will

Standard

Manshoon makes two arcane bolt attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, it is dazed until the end of Manshoon's next turn and knocked prone.

Encounter ✦ Fear, Healing

Standard

Ranged 20

+33 vs Fortitude; 2d10+10 damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). All the target's allies that can see the target are dazed (save ends). Undead creatures within 3 squares of the target regain 15 hit points.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Manshoon spends a healing surge and heals 125 hit points. He gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of its next turn.

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Standard

Manshoon becomes insubstantial and gains a fly speed of 12, but cannot make attacks. He can remain in mist form for up to 1 hour or end the effect as a minor action.

system.biography:
HP 500; Bloodied 250
Regeneration 10 (regeneration functions even while Manshoon is exposed to direct sunlight as long as he wears Manshoon"s bloodmask)
Resist 15 necrotic, 10 against ranged attacks Vulnerable 10 radiant (only if not wearing manshoon"s bloodmask) Immune disease, poison 		Init +17 | AP 1 | Save +2 (+8 against charm effects; +4/+10 while bloodied)
AC 45 (47 while bloodied)Fort 42Ref 44Will 43
Speed 6, climb 4 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 12 (+15)
Con 26 (+22)		Dex 16 (+17)
Int 31 (+24)		Wis 16 (+17)
Cha 28 (+23)
Languages Abyssal, Chondathan, Common, Draconic, Elven, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +29, Diplomacy +28, History +29, Insight +28Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 38

Equipment manshoon"s bloodmask +6 , staff implement .
